description.narrative: By the end of 2018,access and quality of preschool is improved through classroom construction and equipment, dissemination of teaching and learning material as well as capacity building of actors.

sector.narrative: Capacity development of ECD frontline workers
Provision of (formal and non-formal) early-learning / pre-primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision of parental education for school readiness (including in temporary learning spaces)
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary standards and governance
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities

title.narrative: Burundi United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Burundi Country Programme Document 2010-2014 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2018,access and quality of preschool is improved through classroom construction and equipment, dissemination of teaching and learning material as well as capacity building of actors.

description.narrative: A total of 81,000 children (including 44,540 girls) benefited from UNICEF Burundi's support to improve access to and quality of preschools through rehabilitation and equipping of 15 classrooms, training of 992 educators and delivery of pedagogical materials to 1,350 preschool centres. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018

title.narrative: Share of pre-primary education in the national education budget (Percentage of the national education budget spent in the pre-primary, primary, and lower-secondary levels)
(NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ECD facilitators/teachers who received training with funding provided by UNICEF
Service Delivery - Early learning - ECD centres benefiting from UNICEF interventions
System Strengthening - Early learning - Existence of national policy, leadership and budget for early learning - score (1-4), see guidance
Service Delivery - Early learning - Number of ECD/pre-primary classrooms built or rehabilitated with funding managed by UNICEF
